details.prompt_to_evaluate: I am watching the video. Pause the music.
show more information of the pdf
turn off screen recording permission for Terminal
call out the finder in the back
drop the dragged chrome tab to the end of the other chrome
check out Mac in the browser
bring all finder windows to the front
auto switch light and dark mode
view settings of the other screen
view the wiki page in chinese
erase the flashlight area in my drawing

check out the properties panel of the selected text
align the text to the center
open a terminal and set the terminal to the current folder
